#All about the XML files here.

= Introduction =

Summary of all the data needed for the XML files.

= What is a WOW card? =

* card id (ex: TDP-105)
* card name (ex: Eye of Kilrogg)
* rules text (ex: Look at target opponent's hand and choose a card. Remove that card from the game.)
* faction (ex: Alliance, Horde, Neutral)
* type (ex: Ability, Ally, Ally Token, Armor, Blood, Cube, Event, Hero, Item, Lair, Quest, Rune, Token, Weapon)
* supertype ()
* subtype
* race
* class
* talent
* profession
* flavor text
* illustrator
* cost
* health
* atk
* atk type
* strike cost :
* def :
* card rarity :
* releases :

= Needed information =

XML coding:
  * Fields explanation
  * Number of XML files ...

}}}
  * The id number will contain information concerning the card number, the release (Azeroth, Dark Portal ...) AND will be the name of the associated .jpg:
